mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POLL WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND POLL_STATUS='Y' AND POLL_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(POLL_DATE) FROM POLL)

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_EXPLAIN , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG_PATH , PRODUCT_EFFECT , PRODUCT_EFFECT_PATH , POLL_LEVEL , POLL_NO , PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT JOIN POLL_RESULT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN POLL USING(POLL_NO) WHERE POLL_NO = ( SELECT MAX(POLL_NO) FROM POLL WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO , MEMBER_NO , PRODUCT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL , #{memberNo} , #{productNo})

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN, POLL_DATE, POLL_NO FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN, POLL_DATE, POLL_NO, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY POLL_NO DESC) RANK FROM PRODUCT PRO JOIN POLL_RESULT PR USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN POLL USING(POLL_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND POLL_STATUS = 'Y') WHERE RANK <= 3

SELECT POLL_NO, POLL_DATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT POLL_NO, TO_CHAR(POLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') POLL_DATE, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY POLL_NO DESC) RANK FROM POLL JOIN POLL_RESULT USING(POLL_NO) WHERE POLL_LEVEL IN (1,2) AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND POLL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POLL_NO DESC) WHERE RANK <= 3

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_EXPLAIN , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG_PATH , PRODUCT_EFFECT , PRODUCT_EFFECT_PATH , POLL_LEVEL , POLL_NO , PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT JOIN POLL_RESULT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN POLL USING(POLL_NO) WHERE POLL_NO = #{pollNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND POLL_STATUS = 'Y'
